Topic.Title: If you need story or game inspiration...

Posts.EditableText:
Here's the place to start:

https://www.gutenberg.org/

everything there should be public domain, which means free to use for whatever commercial or not.

However, here's something to remember:  Just because something is public domain in one country, doesn't mean it is in some other country - and if you're putting your game on the net, you have to make sure you're using stuff that is public domain everywhere, if you include it.
Posts.HTML:
Here's the place to start:

https://www.gutenberg.org/

everything there should be public domain, which means free to use for whatever commercial or not.

However, here's something to remember: Just because something is public domain in one country, doesn't mean it is in some other country - and if you're putting your game on the net, you have to make sure you're using stuff that is public domain everywhere, if you include it.
